job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
     * Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
     * Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
     * Be a productive member of the team.
job_details.full_text:
Data & Machine Learning Engineer

* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
     * Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
     * Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
     * Be a productive member of the team.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very high-level and lacks specific details about AI or ML tasks. It focuses on general platform improvement, technology research, and system availability, which could apply to many engineering roles beyond specialized ML or GenAI.

phrases: Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the development and enhancement of a software platform, which falls under general software development.

phrases: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
job_tasks.justification: While 'research' can be broad, 'implement new technology solutions' and adhering to 'best practices/standards' are core to software development and engineering.

phrases: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring resiliency and availability of products is a key aspect of operations engineering and maintaining production systems.

phrases: Be a productive member of the team.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies teamwork and collaboration, which are key components of communication and collaboration skills.

phrases: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
soft_skills.justification: The act of researching and suggesting new solutions implies initiative and a drive for improvement, aligning with innovation and ownership.

phrases: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility for system resiliency and availability demonstrates ownership of the product's operational success.

phrases: Be a productive member of the team.
soft_skills.justification: Being a productive member of a team inherently requires effective communication and collaboration.
